metadata.title: CVE-2023-39741 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: lrzip v0.651 was discovered to contain a heap overflow via thelibzpaq::PostProcessor::write(int) function at /libzpaq/libzpaq.cpp. Thisvulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via acrafted file.

criterions.comment: lrzip package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
